headline.print_headline: Panel Picks 7 Nominees to Be State’s Chief Judge
headline.main: Seven Candidates Nominated for New York’s Next Chief Judge

snippet: The choices to succeed Jonathan Lippman include the Westchester County district attorney and a former federal prosecutor in Manhattan.
abstract: New York State Commission on Judicial Nomination sends list of seven nominees to Gov Andrew Cuomo to be considered as successors for Judge Jonathan Lippman, state's chief judge.
lead_paragraph: The choices to succeed Jonathan Lippman include the Westchester County district attorney and a former federal prosecutor in Manhattan.
